/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC    -W -Wall -Werror=return-type -Werror=address -Werror=sequence-point -Wformat -Werror=format-security -Wmissing-declarations -Wundef -Winit-self -Wpointer-arith -Wshadow -Wsign-promo -Wno-narrowing -Wno-delete-non-virtual-dtor -fdiagnostics-show-option -Wno-long-long -pthread -fomit-frame-pointer -msse -msse2 -ffunction-sections -O3 -DNDEBUG  -DNDEBUG   -shared -Wl,-soname,libopencv_flann.so.2.4 -o ../../lib/libopencv_flann.so.2.4.2 CMakeFiles/opencv_flann.dir/src/flann.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opencv_flann.dir/src/precomp.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opencv_flann.dir/src/miniflann.cpp.o ../../lib/libopencv_core.so.2.4.2 -ldl -lm -lpthread -lrt -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -ltbb -lz -ldl -lm -lpthread -lrt -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -ltbb -Wl,-rpath,/home/rani/OpenCV-2.4.2/build/lib:
